en.title: 5,200 Attended Dr Emoto's Bangkok Seminar 07th December 2008!
en.content:
Amazing! A huge audience of 5,200 attended Dr Masaru Emoto's "Scalar Energy Live Water Seminar" held at the Grand Convention Hall, JJ Mall, Bangkok on 7th December 2008. Among the VIPs attending were FE Founder Director KS Lee, Thailand Country Licensee Don Chan, FE Medical Consultant Dr Siva, PD Jangkij, PD Sam Ho, FE Thailand Medical Advisor Dr Wichit Bunyahotara PHD, General Kitti Rattanachaya, Dr Sombat Methanee, Dr Pichai Tovivit PHD, Methawat Thewan Sapsaenyakorn (Father of Thai Jazz), Celebrities Winai Phanthurak, Yangduan Sitthichoke, Nick Niranaam, Tippawan Pinpiban and Surabodin Sombatjaroen.

A special THANK YOU to MCs Khun Suphachon Klinsuwan and Dr Rungthip Chotenaphalai PHD (from Thai Broadcasting Service) for the wonderful job.

A BIG THANK YOU to Don Chan and Jangkij too for a great job promoting the event! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!
